channel.title: Abandoman's Freestyle FM
channel.description: Abandoman improvise new songs each week based on their guests' suggestions.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Two guests join Abandoman to create improvised songs from scratch based on this week's Top 40 and the guests' suggestions.
channel.itunes:summary: Abandoman create new songs each week based on their guests' suggestions.
channel.itunes:author: Abandoman

item.title: Ep 6: Jarred Christmas and Cariad Lloyd
item.dc:creator: abandoman
item.description:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories and songs they’ve been listening to. This week’s songs include:

- an ode to Jarred’s neighbourhood watch representative (inspired by Katy Perry’s Unconditionally)
item.content:encoded:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories and songs they’ve been listening to. This week’s songs include:

- an ode to Jarred’s neighbourhood watch representative (inspired by Katy Perry’s Unconditionally)

- a celebration of Cariad’s ballet skills and Jarred’s body hair (inspired by will.i.am’s Feelin’ Myself) 

- pledges for 2014 resolutions (inspired by Childish Gambino’s 3005)

- a soulful tribute to the humble custard square (inspired by Nelly’s Around The World)

Abandoman: Rob Broderick (rapping), James Hancox (guitar, vocals), Dave Cribb (keyboards, vocals)
item.itunes:subtitle: Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests' stories and songs they've been listening to. This week's songs include:- an ode to Jarred's ...

item.title: Ep 5: Adam Buxton and Laura Corcoran
item.dc:creator: abandoman
item.description:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories and songs they’ve been listening to. This week’s songs include:

- the story of Adam Buxton’s struggle to see magic eye pictures (inspired by Katy Perry’s Roar)
item.content:encoded:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories and songs they’ve been listening to. This week’s songs include:

- the story of Adam Buxton’s struggle to see magic eye pictures (inspired by Katy Perry’s Roar)

- an alternative instructional song for children (inspired by Pharrell’s Happy) 

- Laura Corcoran’s craving for a man who can do basic food shopping (inspired by Little Mix’s Move)

- the tale of Dr Buckles, the space rapper (inspired by David Bowie’s Ashes to Ashes)

Abandoman: Rob Broderick (rapping), James Hancox (guitar, vocals), Dave Cribb (keyboards, vocals)
item.itunes:subtitle: Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests' stories and songs they've been listening to. This week's songs include:- the story of Adam ...

item.title: Bonus ep: The Pilot! With Jarleth Regan and Bec Hill
item.dc:creator: abandoman
item.description:
We’ve been away over the Christmas period but as a New Year’s treat, here’s the first ever episode we recorded - as yet unheard by human ears. It features two of our favourite comics, Jarleth Regan and Bec Hill and contains songs about:


- geography teachers and Japanese mountains
- Bec and Jarleth’s love of Sega and socks respectively
- Bec’s need for motivation
- Melbourne.

Abandoman: Rob Broderick (rapping), James Hancox (guitar and vocals), Dave Cribb (keys and vocals)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ep 3: Christmas Special! Brett Goldstein and Carly Smallman
item.dc:creator: abandoman
item.description:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories and suggestions. This week’s songs include:

- an advertorial for Carly’s new product

- a tribute to one of Brett’s favourite films

< [...]
item.content:encoded:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories and suggestions. This week’s songs include:

- an advertorial for Carly’s new product

- a tribute to one of Brett’s favourite films

- a song about a newly-created Christmas character

- a different look at Santa’s life

Abandoman: Rob Broderick (rapping), James Hancox (guitar, vocals), Dave Cribb (keyboards, vocals)

item.title: Ep 2: Aisling Bea and Joel Dommett
item.dc:creator: abandoman
item.description:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories. This week’s songs include:


- a love story between Aisling Bea and an elf she once worked with
- a tribute to Michelangelo (the turtle, not the artist)
- a tour of Aisling’s hometown
- an apology from Joel Dommett to a postman from his childhood 

Plus, they revisit Joel’s hugely short-lived hip hop career.

Abandoman: Rob Broderick (rapping), Jame [...]
item.content:encoded:
Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests’ stories. This week’s songs include:


- a love story between Aisling Bea and an elf she once worked with
- a tribute to Michelangelo (the turtle, not the artist)
- a tour of Aisling’s hometown
- an apology from Joel Dommett to a postman from his childhood 

Plus, they revisit Joel’s hugely short-lived hip hop career.

Abandoman: Rob Broderick (rapping), James Hancox (guitar, vocals), Dave Cribb (keyboards, vocals)
item.itunes:subtitle: Abandoman improvise four songs from scratch, based on their guests' stories. This week's songs include:- a love story between Aisling Bea and an elf she ...

item.title: Ep 1: Joe Lycett and Rachel Parris
item.dc:creator: abandoman
item.description: The first episode of the brand new Abandoman podcast - the band chat to Joe Lycett and Rachel Parris and improvise four brand new songs based on the music they’ve been listening to and their suggestions for lyrical content.
item.content:encoded: The first episode of the brand new Abandoman podcast - the band chat to Joe Lycett and Rachel Parris and improvise four brand new songs based on the music they’ve been listening to and their suggestions for lyrical content.

item.title: Intro - Episode 1 coming soon!
item.dc:creator: abandoman
item.description: There’s a brand new Abandoman podcast on the way in the next few days! Joe Lycett and Rachel Parris will be our first guests as we create four brand new songs from scratch.
